code.title: Court Code
code.description: A unique code (within Find Case Law) to identify this court entity. Courts which exist only as internal proxy entities should be prefixed with `TNA`.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of this court as it will commonly appear on Find Case Law.

long_name.title: Long Name
long_name.description: Optionally, the formal name of this court where it differs from the `name`.

param.title: Search parameter
param.description: The primary value for the `court` parameter to use when searching for this court.

extra_params.title: Extra parameters
extra_params.description: A list of additional parameters which, if they appear as a `court` parameter in search, will be mapped to this court.

ncn_pattern.title: Neutral Citation Pattern
ncn_pattern.description: A regular expression pattern which matches valid NCNs from this court.

ncn_examples.title: Neutral Citation examples
ncn_examples.description: An array of example NCNs for this court.

items.title: Neutral Citation Number
items.description: An example Neutral Citation Number, matching our expected generic NCN pattern.

start_year.title: Start year
start_year.description: The default start year of the document holding range for this court in Find Case Law.

end_year.title: End year
end_year.description: If this court no longer publishes documents, the default end year of the document holding range for this court in Find Case Law.

listable.name: Listable
listable.description: Should this court appear in public lists of courts supported by Find Case Law?

selectable.name: Selectable
selectable.description: Should this court appear as a selectable option in the list of searchable courts?
